
izzy
====

This package is a toolkit that pulls together functions and classes from Pandas, Scikit-Learn, NumPy, and SciPy. Although not necessarily novel, it's designed to make the legwork of data science more manageable.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   api

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   classification
